cause.description:
The Barbershop Harmony Society working through the Harmony Foundation works to put together programs to enrich musical education.
Note: If you think that other information should be added please let me know, I am not sure what else should go on this page!!
I just want to thank everyone for joining the Cause. It is time that Barbershoppers show the world that we do more than just sing, we also help to strengthen our communities around us with music. Thanks for your support and keep inviting your friends!!
1. Contribute to Life-Long Musical Growth.
2. To work to keep Music in Schools.
3. To spread the word about Barbershop Harmony
4. To bring joy to people through singing.
cause.mission: Provide musical programs to youth through Barbershop Harmony
cause.name: Keep The Whole World Singing
